explanation: [0-0] On a rusty iron plate, one side has a silver pipe interface with a metal clamp, and the other side has a golden threaded connector.

[0-10] Then, a screw starts to rotate, and the golden metal nut behind the iron plate is tightly attached to the iron plate. Then the screen switches, a plastic bag pours out a pile of metal nuts on the cement floor. Then the screen switches, a hand pinches a metal nut, and a metal tool rotates a rivet through the metal nut. Then the screen switches, there is an obvious circular hole and a smaller screw fixing point on a square metal pipe, then the screen switches, a metal tool rotates above to fix the rivet.

[10-18] Then, the screen switches, a hand is holding a metal pipe with metal rivets on it, and a metal ruler knocks on the pipe opening. Then the screen switches, the metal pipe is clamped in the middle of the iron, a metal tool rotates on it, and the rivet on the metal pipe is pulled out. Then a perforated metal plate is aligned with the hole on the metal pipe, and the rivet nut is installed on the metal part, and then the bolt is screwed into the rivet nut. Then the metal plate is placed on the bolt and tightened with an electric drill, and then the metal plate is shaken by hand.
